trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Randburg
There were no other sightings in Randburg on or around December 31st 2012
Summary: Orange light which showed up as black when behind clouds
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the suburb of Linden (Randburg) in Johannesburg, South Africa at about 11h50 pm, we realized an orange light moving from East to West over our house. We speculated and wrote it off as nothing much. At just past midnight, 3 more appeared and when they went behind the cloud cover, instead of being completely gone or diffused, they seemed cast a shadow that was round (cylindrical) on the cloud. They seemed to have a strange halo around them which changed direction every now an again.
